messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a whoop of rodents have migrated into the maintenance tunnels.
